CALL PRIORITY: The customer is here by assured of priority for services to be provided on his instrument.
CHARGEABILITY: The customer is required to pay cost for the replacement of parts and/or consumables during the term of this A.M.C.

PREVENTIVE MAINTENANCE VISITS:
Preventive maintenance visits will be provided at an interval of 4 months during this term of AMC for calibration, maintenance procedure in order to prevent any possible breakdown by the company's Service Engineers.

BREAKDOWN CALLS: The company agrees to honour breakdown calls during the term of this AMC for malfunctioning of the equipment arising due to causes other than inadequate environment fault, electrical condition, stabilizer malfunctioning and misuse.

The Service Engineer of the Company shall prepare a service report regarding the jobs carried out during his visit to customer and the same shall be treated as evidence of the visit. The company undertakes to put its best efforts to carryout its obligation arising out of the conditions of the agreement but it is not supposed to be held liable for any loss, cost or expenses incurred directly or indirectly for any delay in doing so.

The customer here by undertakes to keep the instrument clean, in a dust free environment and at a place approved by the company's engineer, ensuring it's correct operation, preventing misuse and to report correctly any problems related to it's operation. The customer also agrees further to provide proper electrical installations & proper voltage stabilization. Any damage to the instrument caused due to improper electrical installation is not covered under the preview of this AMC.

Undertaking: We, allow the company's Engineer to open my Instrument & Sr. No. for Service purpose as it is under AMC, and resolve problem. While Opening the instrument if any other parts found damaged, it will not be Vector Engineer's responsibility.

This agreement shall be deemed null & void in case the instrument is shifted from its original place of installation or the ownership of instrument is transferred, Instrument is misused, dismantled, altered or serviced by any person other than company's deputed Service Engineer. The company reserves the right to charge separately if the instrument requires to be reinstalled elsewhere from its original place. Any dispute or difference arising at any time during the term of this agreement shall be resolved in accordance with the provision of Indian Arbitration Act 1940 and only the courts of Navsari shall have the Jurisdiction in all matters.
The company reserves the right to refuse service in case the customer is found to use reagent supplied from any other company or from any distributor other than those authorized by the company.

ol.li: This analyzer will be under CMC for ___ year after the expiry of the warranty period.

VECTOR will ensure proper functioning of analyzer during the said CMC, provided the analyzer is used by customer as per conditions recommended by VECTOR as below:
Analyzer will be operated in air-conditioned environment.
Analyzer shall be operated using regulated Power supply through on-line UPS / CVT
Proper earthling as per norms.
Analyzer should be operated by technicians trained by VECTOR.
VECTOR will ensure 92% up time of the analyzer. Any breakdown will be attended with in max 24 working hours by VECTOR based on written communication from customer.
The CMC is limited only to the analyzer unit and VECTOR will not be responsible to provide the CMC on the peripherals supplied along with analyzer like Computer, printer, RO Plant etc.
This Agreement is non-negotiable.
Vector will, at its option, repair or replace the defective parts free of charge, provided the customer notifies Vector of the analyzer defect within the scope of CMC in writing.
Vector will not accept any request of analyzer replacement
Vector will use parts from company available stock for repair work during the period of CMC.
The replaced defective parts from the analyzer t will be the property of vector.

Vector will, at its option either repair the analyzer at customer site or carry the analyzer to their service center to carry out the repair works, and during this period vector will not be responsible to provide any stand by analyzer to customer.
